newsitem.title: ALBANIA: SOCCER-HAFIZI NAMED AS ALBANIA'S NEW COACH.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-HAFIZI NAMED AS ALBANIA'S NEW COACH.

text.p: Astrit Hafizi will replace Neptun Bajko as Albania's coach, the Albanian Football Federation said on Tuesday.

Bajko, who had coached the team since August 1994, resigned last week in the wake of a 3-0 home defeat to Portugal in a World Cup group nine qualifier in Tirana, saying his players had refused to follow his tactics.
Hafizi, 43, previously coached Albanian first division team Vllaznia, where he also played from 1968 to 1984.
Albania play their next World Cup qualifier on November 9 against Armenia.
